oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Military uniforms
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee - History - 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: George S. Nichols (1845-1918) in the Confederate uniform of the 1st Tennessee Regiment. He wears a kepi, and only the top button of his tunic is fastened.
